description: This file defines a React Native screen component 'NotesListScreen' that displays a list of notes with filtering, search, and navigation functionalities. It integrates various UI components and hooks to manage state and theme.

methods.name: NotesListScreen
methods.description: Main functional React component rendering the notes list, search bar, header, floating action button, and handling navigation and filtering.

methods.name: onAdd
methods.description: Handles navigation to the note editor in creation mode for the selected category.
